mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( id, UserEmail, UserName, UserPassword, UserLevel, createdAt, updatedAt ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{UserEmail}, #{UserName}, #{UserPassword}, #{UserLevel}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, UserEmail, UserName, UserLevel, createdAt, updatedAt FROM users ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{page}
mapper.sql: WHERE UserEmail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR UserName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR UserLevel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
